import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function ApplicatinonTabs() { const [prevValue, setPrevValue] = useState(0) const AppTabs = (e) => { e.stopPropagation() const _div = e.currentTarget document.querySelectorAll(".application-tabs-items>section>div").forEach((item) => { // item.style.border = `unset`; item.removeAttribute("class"); item.children[1].removeAttribute("class") item.removeAttribute("isComeFromLeftToRight"); const _src = item.children[2].src item.children[0].children[0].src = _src; item.parentElement.classList.remove("yek") }) const _src = _div.children[3].src _div.children[0].children[0].src = _src // _div.style.border = ` 1px solid white `; _div.classList.add("pointer-none") _div.classList.add("ssd") _div.parentElement.classList.add("yek") _div.children[1].classList.add("ssp") const divAttrNum = _div.getAttribute("data-num"); const divAttrInfo = _div.getAttribute("data-info"); const currentValue = divAttrNum; if (currentValue > prevValue) { } else { _div.setAttribute("isComeFromLeftToRight", "true") } setPrevValue(currentValue) // ************************************************************ document.querySelectorAll(".application-tabs-slider>div").forEach((slider) => { const sliderAttrInfo = slider.getAttribute("data-info"); slider.removeAttribute("class") if (_div.getAttribute("isComeFromLeftToRight")) { if (sliderAttrInfo === divAttrInfo) { slider.classList.add("left-to-right") } } else { slider.classList.remove("right-to-left") if (sliderAttrInfo === divAttrInfo) { slider.classList.add("right-to-left") } } }); } return (

) } export default ApplicatinonTabs
